job_details.degree_required: College degree Computer Science, or other related field preferred

jd: Role:- Sr .Net Application DeveloperLocation:- Charlotte, NC, Hartford, CT or Branchville, NJ (hybrid – 3 days a week in the office)(USC, H4 EAD Only) Must have:Experienced .Net Developer - mid-tier levelReally good communication skillsHuge plus if coming from an insurance company Day to DayThe .Net developer will be working on workflows, which is where ProCede comes in. Note you're not looking for a candidate that worked for the vendor ProCede; this is a catch all role - meaning it's more about understanding the workflow.Responsible to start with modifying systems Qualifications -Education: Knowledge and Experience: Job Description: Responsibilities:Meet with business unit representatives to define and evaluate routine business automation needs. Interpret business specifications to prepare for analysis/design functions.Participate in systems analysis, general systems design, and detail systems design.Generate, test, and document program code. Debug and resolve problems of moderate difficulty.Modify existing applications programs or writes new programs of basic to moderate complexity and scope, working with applications systems designs and specifications and utilizing standards, procedures, and techniques.Install, configure, and support applications running on Windows ServerResearch and resolve problems in the production environment.Assist others with debugging whenever necessary.Responsible to acquire training, as needed, and will learn user functions, organization, and role in the enterprise to the extent required.Systems to support, administer and improve:ProCedeRuns on Windows Server + SQLServer.Technologies: CMD/Bat + C# .Net + Microfocus Cobol.ProCede Admin skills are desirable, but insurance background and aptitude to learn ProCede/Reinsurance will workSmaller Vendor Supplied Systems:Wells Fargo Travel & ExpenseOthers…Custom Finance Applications Qualifications:5+ years of experience in windows application/ system administrationUnderstanding of Insurance and / or reinsurance desirable.OR Financial/Accounting system experience desirableAbility to easily move between multiple projects at any given time.Requires excellent communication skills, analytic ability, strong judgment and the ability to work directly with customers and IT management and staff.Requires the interest and ability to acquire a deep knowledge of business functions and systems, and offer application development technological alternatives.Strong interpersonal communication skills.College degree Computer Science, or other related field preferred.Java Development ExperienceMVC & C# .Net Development ExperienceProCede experience helpful Best Regards,Minu RoySr. Technical Recruiter || InfoTech Spectrum Inc.Email : minu.roy@infotechspectrum.com || Web: www.infotechspectrum.com2060, Walsh Ave, #120, Santa Clara, CA 95050
